quote: Time is the Mind of Space.
author: Samuel Alexander,  Space, Time and Deity: The Gifford Lectures at Glasgow Part One

quote: Time works so hard for us, if only we can let it.
author: Tana French,  The Likeness

quote: Time is what keeps things from happening all at once.
author: Ann Brashares,  The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants

quote: Time has no meaning,Love will endure..
author: Jude Deveraux

quote: Time is simply the measurement of human progression against that of existence.
author: Gerald M. Givens

quote: We’re here, and then we’re gone, and it’s not about the time we’re here, but what we do with the time.
author: Rick Yancey,  The 5th Wave

quote: If the moment is everthing, then everything is time.
author: Benny Bellamacina,  The King of Rhyme

quote: Time is the coin of your life. It is the only coin you have, and only you can determine how it will be spent. Be careful lest you let other people spend it for you.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: Time is a drug. Too much of it kills you.
author: Terry Pratchett,  Small Gods

quote: Time is the most precious element of human existence. The successful person knows how to put energy into time and how to draw success from time.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: Time flows away like the water in the river.
author: Confucius

quote: There are so many kinds of time. The time by which we measure our lives. Months and years. Or the big time, the time that raises mountains and makes stars. Or all the things that happen between one heartbeat and the next. Its hard to live in all those kinds of times. Easy to forget that you live in all of them.
author: Robert Charles Wilson,  Spin

quote: Time is just quantified eternity.
author: Deepak Chopra,  The Way of the Wizard: Twenty Spiritual Lessons for Creating the Life You Want

quote: Being with you and not being with you is the only way I have to measure time.
author: Jorge Luis Borges

quote: Time deals gently only with those who take it gently.
author: Anatole France,  The Crime of Sylvestre Bonnard

quote: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien,  The Fellowship of the Ring

quote: Time is an illusion. Lunchtime doubly so.
author: Douglas Adams,  The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

quote: time made me stronger, you're no longer on my mind
author: Boyz II Men

quote: If time be judiciously employed, there is time for everything.
author: George Head,  A Home Tour Through the Manufacturing Districts of England in the Summer of 1835

quote: Time is the longest distance between two places.
author: Tennessee Williams,  The Glass Menagerie

quote: Time flies like an arrow; fruit flies like a banana.
author: Anthony G. Oettinger

quote: Time cannot be packaged and ribboned and left under trees for christmas morning.Time can't be given.But it can be shared
author: Cecelia Ahern,  The Gift

quote: Time expands, then contracts, all in tune with the stirrings of the heart.
author: Haruki Murakami,  Kafka on the Shore

quote: But hurry, let's entwine ourselves as one, our mouth broken, our soul bitten by love, so time discovers us safely destroyed.
author: Federico García Lorca

quote: Time is precious, but truth is more precious than time.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: All great achievements require time.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Time is standing still; we are moving with the waves of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Time folds you in its arms and gives you one last kiss, and then it flattens you out and folds you up and tucks you away until it's time for you to become someone else's past time, and then time folds again.
author: Margaret Atwood,  The Tent

quote: Time is the coin of your life. You spend it. Do not allow others to spend it for you.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: Time bows to authentic commitment, and it stretches to accommodate it.
author: Will Hewett

quote: Can you do it? When the time comes? When the time comes there will be no time. Now is the time. Curse God and die.
author: Cormac McCarthy,  The Road

quote: We cannot measure time. We can only measure changes of life and the universe.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: In eternity there is no time, only an instant long enough for a joke.
author: Hermann Hesse,  Steppenwolf

quote: The chief beauty about timeis that you cannot waste it in advance.The next year, the next day, the next hour are lying ready for you,as perfect, as unspoiled,as if you had never wasted or misapplieda single moment in all your life.You can turn over a new leaf every hourif you choose.
author: Arnold Bennett

quote: Aside from velcro, time is the most mysterious substance in the universe. You can't see it or touch it, yet a plumber can charge you upwards of seventy-five dollars per hour for it, without necessarily fixing anything.
author: Dave Barry

quote: Time is a game played beautifully by children.
author: Heraclitus,  Fragments

quote: If you learn how to value time, you will have enough. If you don’t value time, then you will suffer from the lack of time.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: There will be time, there will be timeTo prepare a face to meet the faces that you meet.
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: Time (again, Time) like the soul, wears many faces, many bodies and climates and attitudes. The past is one face, the present a second and the future yet another.
author: Aberjhani,  Elemental: The Power of Illuminated Love

quote: Time was the most precious thing in the world to me, and I’d just given her all of it. Because I was falling for her. Because I cared for her. Because I wanted to give her something to remember me by, even if it would eventually fade like its namesake. Time… what an absolute horror-inducing word
author: Rachel Van Dyken,  Ruin

quote: Time is Too Slow for those who Wait, Too Swift for those who Fear, Too Long for those who Grieve, Too Short for those who Rejoice; But for those who Love, Time is not.
author: Henry Van Dyke,  Music and Other Poems

quote: People assume that time is a strict progression of cause to effect, but *actually* from a non-linear, non-subjective viewpoint - it's more like a big ball of wibbly wobbly... time-y wimey... stuff.
author: Steven Moffat

quote: Spending time with you showed me what I’ve been missing in my life.
author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Choice

quote: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Get busy with the issue! In this regard, time is not friendly…nor should it be.
author: T.F. Hodge,  From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Time extracts various values from a painter's work. When these values are exhausted the pictures are forgotten, and the more a picture has to give, the greater it is.
author: Henri Matisse

quote: Time is too slow for those who wait, too swift for those who fear, too long for those who grieve, too short for those who rejoice, but for those who love, time is eternity.
author: Henry Van Dyke

quote: Lost Time is never found again.
author: Benjamin Franklin,  Poor Richard's Almanack

quote: Time and space have no meaning, just as your conscious thoughts are meaningless.
author: Stephen Richards,  Cosmic Ordering Guide

quote: Love is space and time measured by the heart.
author: Marcel Proust
